text: Jaoid Chiguer, by some sources spelled Jaouad (11 August 1985 – 25 January 2021), was a French amateur boxer. He qualified for the 2008 Olympics at welterweight. Chiguer died on 25 January 2021, at the age of 35 from heart attack.Le boxeur troyen Jaoid Chiguer est décédé ==References== ==Other websites== * 2nd Qualifier * Sports-reference.com profile * Category:1985 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Olympians for France Category:French boxers Category:People from Troyes Category:Sportspeople from Grand Est
title: Jaoid Chiguer
